Name: Fat Godfather
Ingredients: 60 ml Blended Scotch whisky bacon fat washed
Instructions: Fat-wash a bottle of peaty Scotch whisky with smoky bacon fat. POUR the now clarified smoky bacon-flavoured Scotch and other ingredients into mixing glass, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
History: Created in 2016 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England for Disaronno's Mixing Star project.
Nutrition: One serving of Fat Godfather contains 245 calories
